title: Love, Marriage, Social Media; Letters Written Long Hand and American Commercial Engraving
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060349im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Universal_Penman014_6464.jpg)

[http://www.aiga.org/content.cfm/if-edith-wharton-had-facebooked](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060349/http:/www.aiga.org/content.cfm/if-edith-wharton-had-facebooked "http://www.aiga.org/content.cfm/if-edith-wharton-had-facebooked")
